p: In this study, the majority of children were under 2 years old. This is interesting as recent studies from Taiwan and China found that rate of HAdV infection increased with age.[ 23, 25] However, in the study from Taiwan, only 12% of patients had LRTIs. The experiences in Singapore, where most paediatric patients infected with HAdV were < 2 years old. [ 21] and in Seremban, Malaysia, where in 2015 the median age of inpatients with HAdV was14 months, are more similar to ours.[ 4] It has been reported that young children are at increased risk of severe HAdV infections. [ 26]
